properties.description: in this pipeline, I will import data from different sources into Azure SQL

sink.preCopyScript:
IF EXISTS(SELECT * FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES where TABLE_NAME = 'MedicareProviderChargeInpatient' AND TABLE_SCHEMA = 'dbo')
    DROP TABLE [dbo].[MedicareProviderChargeInpatient];
ELSE
	CREATE TABLE [dbo].[MedicareProviderChargeInpatient] (
		DRGDefinition VARCHAR(100),
		ProviderId INT,
		ProviderName VARCHAR(100),
		ProviderStreetAddress VARCHAR(100),
		ProviderCity VARCHAR(50),
		ProviderState VARCHAR(15),
		ProviderZipCode VARCHAR(10),
		HospitalReferralRegionDescription VARCHAR(100),
		TotalDischarges MONEY,
		AverageCoveredCharges MONEY,
		AverageTotalPayments MONEY,
		AverageMedicarePayments MONEY
 );
